name: Minimalist Typography Poster
description: Clean, minimalist typography design for modern spaces. Features inspirational quote in elegant sans-serif font on matte paper.

name: Botanical Illustration Poster
description: Detailed botanical illustration featuring exotic plants and flowers. Scientific accuracy meets artistic beauty in this museum-quality print.

name: Motivational Quote Poster
description: Inspirational quote poster to keep you motivated every day. Bold typography on minimalist background creates strong visual impact.

name: Cityscape Poster
description: Urban cityscape poster featuring iconic skylines. Dramatic perspective captures the energy and architecture of metropolitan life.

name: Watercolor Ocean Poster
description: Delicate watercolor painting of ocean waves and coastal scenery. Soothing blues and aquamarine tones create a tranquil atmosphere.

name: Vintage Travel Poster
description: Classic travel poster inspired by mid-century tourism advertisements. Features stylized destination artwork with retro typography.
